roles.name: Super User
roles.description: System Administrator. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.

roles.name: Grievance Officer
roles.description: Heads the grivance cell. Also all complaints that cannot be routed based on the rules are routed to Grievance Officer.

roles.name: Grivance Administrator
roles.description: System Administator for PGR. Can change PGR Master data only.

roles.name: PTIS Master
roles.description: Who has a access to Property Tax Masters

roles.name: PTIS Admin
roles.description: Who has a access to change tax rates, factor etc

roles.name: TL Admin
roles.description: Who has a access to Trade License Masters

roles.name: TL Creator
roles.description: Who has a access to Trade License Services

roles.name: Collection Operator
roles.description: Can Create, Search and Update Receipt

roles.name: TL Approver
roles.description: Who has a access to Trade License Workflow

roles.name: Collection Report Viewer
roles.description: Collection Report Viewer can view Reports

roles.name: Abstract Estimate Creator
roles.description: Who has a access to create Abstract Estimate

roles.name: Financials Approver
roles.description: Who has a access to capture Financial details and budgetary/financial sanction

roles.name: Detailed Estimate Creator
roles.description: Who has a access to create Detailed Estimate

roles.name: LOA Creator
roles.description: Who has a access to create Letter Of Acceptance

roles.name: WO Creator
roles.description: Who has a access to create Work Order

roles.name: Works Bill Creator
roles.description: Who has a access to create Contractor Bill

roles.name: Contractor Advance creator
roles.description: Who has a access to create Contractor Advance

roles.name: MB creator
roles.description: Who has a access to create MB

roles.name: Works Approver
roles.description: Who has a access to approve/verify Works objects

roles.name: Works Administrator
roles.description: Who has a access to all the transactions, masters and reports

roles.name: Works Master creator
roles.description: Who has a access to all the works masters.

roles.name: Department Grievance Routing Officer
roles.description: GRO for a sepcific dept who assings the grievances to last mile employees

roles.name: Customer Support Representative
roles.description: Employee who files and follows up complaints on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: PGR Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that has super access over the system

roles.name: Counter Employee
roles.description: Employee at the counter who performs assessment on behalf of citizen

roles.name: ULB Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that as access over an ulb

roles.name: State Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that as access over a state

roles.name: EGF Bill Creator
roles.description: Employee who creates Bills in finance

roles.name: EGF Bill Approver
roles.description: Employee who takes part in  Bills  approval in finance

roles.name: Finance Voucher Creator
roles.description: One who can create a voucher

roles.name: Finance Voucher Approver
roles.description: One who can approve a voucher

roles.name: Finance Payment Creator
roles.description: One who can create a payment

roles.name: Finance Payment Approver
roles.description: One who can approve a payment

roles.name: Finance Master Admin
roles.description: One who is the administrator for all master data in Finance

roles.name: Finance Report View
roles.description: One who has acess to all financial reports

roles.name: Collections Receipt Creator
roles.description: One who can create and approve a receipt and receipt voucher

roles.name: Collections Remitter
roles.description: One who can remit the instruments to bank

roles.name: System Integrator Finance
roles.description: Role for allowing system integration of Finance app with rainmaker

roles.name: System Integrator W&S
roles.description: Role for allowing system integration of Water and Sewerage app with rainmaker

roles.name: TL Counter Employee
roles.description: Counter Employee in Trade License who files TL on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: TL Approver
roles.description: Approver who verifies and approves the TL application

roles.name: Employee Finance
roles.description: All Employees who use Finance application

roles.name: Finance Adminsitrator
roles.description: All Employees who are Finance application administrator

roles.name: PGR Last Mile Employee
roles.description: PGR Last mile employee to whom the request can be assigned

roles.name: Anonymous User
roles.description: Anonymous User to be used in case of no auth

roles.name: BPA Services verifier
roles.description: BPA Services workflow document & field inspection verifier

roles.name: WS Counter Employee
roles.description: WS counter employee can take action as citizen

roles.name: WS Field Inspector
roles.description: WS Inspector can take action like verify and forword, send back to do

roles.name: WS Approver
roles.description: WS Approver can approve the connection application

roles.name: WS Clerk
roles.description: WS Clerk can activate the connection application

roles.name: SW Counter Employee
roles.description: SW counter employee can take action as citizen

roles.name: SW Field Inspector
roles.description: SW Inspector can take action like verify and forword, send back to do

roles.name: SW Approver
roles.description: SW Approver can approve the connection application

roles.name: SW Clerk
roles.description: SW Clerk can activate the connection application

roles.name: National Dashboard Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that as access over a National

roles.name: Birth Application Creator
roles.description: Birth User that can only create new applications

roles.name: Death Application Creator
roles.description: Death User that can only create new applications

roles.name: Birth Application Viewer
roles.description: Birth User that can only search and view applications

roles.name: Death Application Viewer
roles.description: Death User that can only search and view applications

roles.description: Birth and Death User that can view tabular reports
